stitch in the previous row when you make the next single_crochet it will feel like you are skipping a stitch 18 round 22 3 single_crochet in off-white single_crochet in off-white but insert the hook into the lower v of the off-white stitch in the previous row 4 single_crochet in yellow 5 half_double_crochet in yellow 5 single_crochet in yellow round 23 from now on only in yellow 6 single_crochet 10 half_double_crochet 4 single_crochet round 24 work in the back loops only in this round single_crochet decrease x 6 12 round 25 6 decrease 6 round 26 sew opening closed by threading tapestry needle though all 6 single_crochet outer legs hide the tail in some stitches and leave the rest of the tail in the pokemon pokeball to dragonite reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin add the tan lines with some tan yarn and a tapestry needle start at the bottom of the body inserting the needle from inside the body to the outside so the ball yarn tail can be later worked into some inside stitches and hidden in the body i pulled through about an arms length of yarn any more would be too unwieldy i was able to just finish all the stitches with
